page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF COLIN
page.content: I get up at 7am, have my breakfast and get dressed. I live at Tealing but go to Linlathen High School in Dundee. Some children in the area go to Forfar Academy. I leave the house at 8am and cycle about 2 miles to the main road. I leave my bike at a local garage and wait for the bus to come from Forfar. I get on the service bus at 8.30am. The fare would normally cost me 25p but I have a bus pass so it costs me nothing. At school I study English, Mathematics, Geography, Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Technical Drawing. I stay at school for my lunch although I used to go home. I get the bus from school at 4.15pm and cycle home from the garage. At night I usually go down to the village and have a game of football. I belong to the local Scout Troop which meets once a week.
